description: Unique primary key identifying this schedule comment record.
Foreign key linking the note to the associated scheduled asset procedure; confirm exact target entity with SME.
System timestamp when the record was created.
User account that created the record (may be system).
Setting controlling whether and where the note prints on documents; likely an enumeration, not simple boolean—confirm with SME.
Controls if/how the note is copied to related records (e.g., generated work orders); likely bitmask/enum—confirm with SME.
Free-text comment associated with the scheduled work.
User account that last modified the record in the core system.
System-maintained timestamp of the most recent change.
Application/UI-maintained timestamp of the most recent user edit.
Indicator that the record originated from an external import (0/1 or similar).
Application-captured user identifier for the creator.
Application-captured timestamp when the record was created.
Application-captured user identifier for the last editor.
Application-captured timestamp of the most recent user edit.
